name: Gerascophobia
description:
This is Gerascophobia.

A FPS survival in an an abandoned and chemically infested laboratory. The lab is producing chemicals that’s making you age fast! In order to delay the inevitable - your death - you must mix and make elements to make potions in order to survive longer. Keep in mind that death is still inevitable.

What can you do?

  1.  Find the key to unlock the door
  2.  Gather the different flasks spread out in the map.
  3. Craft potions by the lab equipment (put a flask on the 1st stand and another flask on the 2nd stand). Be careful, some potions are harmful!
  4.  Survive...

Team:

Azaam (https://itch.io/profile/xiphactinus27) : Programmer, Audio

Kyle (https://itch.io/profile/xiphactinus27):  3D Models, 2D Sprites, textures

The assets that aren't developed by us, are cc-0. This was created in the Godot 3.4.4 Engine
